name: Input Field
description: Provides a layout for users to input text to perform a search or execute a command. This is suitable for general information searches, in-app searches, or other text-based actions.
examples: I want to search for furniture.
I'd like to search within my messages.
Find a new contact to add.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire input component.

text_heading.description: A label or prompt that describes the action to be taken (e.g., 'Search for:', 'Enter command:').

profile_icon.description: The path to an icon representing the context of the action, such as a user's profile or the app to be searched within (max 3 icons).

input_field.description: The main text input area for the user's query or command.
input_field.placeholder: Placeholder text within the input field that suggests what can be entered (e.g., 'Search messages').

action_button_text.description: The text label for the submit button (e.g., 'Search', 'Send').

html:
{{ data.component_title }}

{{ data.text_heading }}
